name: “Global Conference on Aerospace Engineering and Technology” (Aerospace-2021)
content: The goal of Aerospace-2021 is to bring together researchers, scientists, engineers, and scholar students to exchange and share their experiences, new ideas, and research results about all aspects of the Aerospace Engineering and Technology Conference, and discusses the practical challenges encountered and the solutions adopted. website: https://www.pagesconferences.com/aerospace-engineering-conference/
